heroSection.title: Empower Arab Kids to code in Arabic
heroSection.paragraph: Discover a fun and interactive way for your kids to learn programming in Arabic

featuresSection.title: Let your child a Future Leader not only a coder through our learning path
featuresSection.description: our platform offers interactive courses, parent resources, and community support ,all in Arabic. Start your child's coding journey today!

features.title: Interactive Courses
features.description: Engaging and interactive coding courses designed for kids.

features.title: Parent Resources
features.description: Access helpful resources to support your child's learning journey.

features.title: Community Support
features.description: Connect with a supportive community of like-minded parents.

coursesSection.title: Courses
coursesSection.description: Explore our wide range of programming courses for kids.

testimonials.opinion: My child has greatly benefited from this platform. Learning programming in Arabic has made it easier for them to grasp the concepts and apply them in real-life scenarios.
